headline: SmarterChains Chairman Gustavo Ghory Joins FourKites' Strategic Advisory Council
summary: CHICAGO, July 01, 2025--Former Kimberly-Clark and Procter & Gamble supply chain leader joins FourKites' Strategic Advisory Council.
